title: How can i switch emails with my league account to a different email?
body: I was wondering how can i switch the email i singed up with to a different one?

replies.body:
I actually do have a question, so my old friend gave me his email to start a league of legends account although his email isn'
t working so i have no way to change it can i change it somehow?

You can do so in your [Account Protection panel](https://account.leagueoflegends.com/na/en/protect), but this method only works if you have access to the current email associated with your account.

Let me know if  you have any questions.
Go to the top right of the page and click on your username, a drop down box should appear. Click settings and it will redirect you to a list where the change email option is located!
